author: Warhammer
description:
For millennia, the Forgefathers of the Salamanders have led the Chapter's search across the galaxy to recover nine legendary Artefacts of Vulkan. At a simple request, the Forgefather Vulcan He’stan has drawn upon the full might of our paintbrushes to make him ready for his great quest into the galaxy, fire and all!

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Black Templar/Black Legion
Imperial Fist 
Warp Lightning

Base:
Leadbelcher
Runelord Brass

Layer:
Moot Green 
Pallid Wych Flesh
Pink Horror
Stormhost Silver
Troll Slayer Orange
World Bearers Red

Shade:
Targor Rageshade

Technical:
Contrast Medium
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
Small Base STC
Small Drybrush STC
Small Layer STC

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.


Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: ht
title: Painting Vulkan He’stan! Plus FIRE Effects! | Warhammer 40,000
